channel.title: Creating an SQL Database?
channel.description: I never enocuntered this before as I never use SQL for any reason, but I'm currently developing an 803+ server, and I already have an experienced web designer and developer for the Development Team. However we need an SQL Database that, the server will save the player saves to. That way the user who plays the server won't have to make any additional accounts on the forums, also to show how many players are currently online on the site aswell. IF anyone could help me, add me on Skype, FolkDiss, or E-mail me, FolkDiss@outlook.com, or message me on here! I can pay aswell, but not until next month.

item.title: Creating an SQL Database?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Get a new web developer, this is very basic.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating an SQL Database?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You could always add more columns to the table (for your forums) for the server’s data so when each player registers on the forums the game account is created, all they need to do is login.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating an SQL Database?
item.dc:creator: @FolkDiss FolkDiss
item.description:
@FolkDiss wrote:

I never enocuntered this before as I never use SQL for any reason, but I’m currently developing an 803+ server, and I already have an experienced web designer and developer for the Development Team. However we need an SQL Database that, the server will save the player saves to. That way the user who plays the server won’t have to make any additional accounts on the forums, also to show how many players are currently online on the site aswell. IF anyone could help me, add me on Skype, FolkDiss, or E-mail me, FolkDiss@outlook.com, or message me on here! I can pay aswell, but not until next month.
